function.name: listtoxml
function.description: Converts the list variable value to XML. Node properties should start with an ‘@’. CDATA nodes should be named ‘!CDATA’. To have multiple nodes with the same name (nodenames in lists are unique) use: {#01NodeName = “”, #02NodeName = “”}.

examples.example: value b1value c1valuevalue c2value b2 value ? text and & .]]> hehehe and & .]]]]>bn]]>

example.description: Note: the root node is created with the one element of the outer list.

examples.example: The outer list must have one and only one element. Naming of the elements in the list is kind of tricky. Convert existing XML to a list using ‘’xmltolist()’’ for an example.
